column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Tapas + homemade deliciousness of sangria + paella= love party. It's not very expensive
column3: the neighborhood is trendy and entertaining
column4: and you will leave STUFFED. It's a good night out. If you haven't tried it yet
column5: then get a move on. My favorite is still Iberico (the "patatas bravas" are mouth watering there
column7: but when it comes to neighborhood and restaurant dining then this takes the cake of the two. I've always had great service.
